name: Doctor Hospital Time Management Game
description:
Hey Guys!! This time we have come up with your favourite hospital dash game. In this game, we have covered lots of hospital activities like general hospital 
check ups and treatments, dental hospital check ups and treatments & surgery hospital for legs and hands. You can enjoy three gameplay areas in a single game.
The game involves different rewards and daily challenges to tighten your gameplay experience. So what are you waiting for guys? There are so many patients waiting 
for you to be treated. Cure all the patients and unlock all categories of the hospital.

Key Features:
Become a doctor and cure the patients
Face the daily challenges and get fantastic rewards
Boost you gameplay using power ups
Serve all the customers using different medicines and equipments
Unlock all the hospitals for variety of treatments
